seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with 4-5 years relevant experience aligns with senior level in data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and data processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Mandatory skills include ETL tools, Azure Databricks, and batch processing mentioned in responsibilities

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, team leadership, or architectural oversight; role focuses on implementation and collaboration

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in skills or responsibilities

processing_paradigm.evidence: Responsibilities mention both batch and real-time processing, indicating hybrid paradigm

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Blob (data lake) and potential warehouse usage implied through data processing responsibilities

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Kochi, Kerala, India with onsite work model, indicating regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India, implying India-specific timezone focus

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in India and no mention of student visa support suggests not OPT/CPT friendly
